price: 9. Kuwase (Xaqa) rumeeyey oo samaha fala, Waxaan dhex gelin kuwa wanaagsan (Jannada gudaheeda).
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ لَنُدۡخِلَنَّهُمۡ فِي ٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti lanud'khilannahum fī al-ṣāliḥīna
